name: City Builder - Rio
description:
City Builder - Rio 〈 Easy Version 〉
Rio de Janeiro, Brazile

-Build Stadium.
-Build Hotel for Visitors.
-Build Residential Area.
-Collect Tax from Residential Area.
-Construction Transportation infra.
-Join the Gold market.
-Let's build Landmark of all around the world.

**Easy version than other City Builder Version.
Easy Version: Taxation rates are higher than other City Builder versions.
